M

Main - Class in com.icf.iglistchanger
This class consists of a single static method - 'main' - that reads a control file (xml) of table descriptors, creates a new Controller class, then loops through the control file's table descriptor elements and processes each by calling the appropriate Controller class methods.
Main - Class in com.icf.iglistchanger
This class consists of a single static method - 'main' - that reads a control file (xml) of table descriptors, creates a new Controller class, then loops through the control file's table descriptor elements and processes each by calling the appropriate Controller class methods.

processTableHeader() - Method in class com.icf.iglistchanger.Controller
Using the data from the current table alteration descriptor, re-generate the target table's header info by copying existing columns from the original table to a new table, and by creating new columns based on the new-cols specs from the descriptor.
processTableHeader() - Method in class com.icf.iglistchanger.Controller
Using the data from the current table alteration descriptor, re-generate the target table's header info by copying existing columns from the original table to a new table, and by creating new columns based on the new-cols specs from the descriptor.
processTableRows() - Method in class com.icf.iglistchanger.Controller
Using the data from the current table alteration descriptor, re-generate the target table's rows by copying existing row columns from the original table to a new table, and by creating new row columns based on the new-cols specs from the descriptor, and populating those new columns with data from the corresponding resource json object based on the new-column spec data for each new column.
processTableRows() - Method in class com.icf.iglistchanger.Controller
Using the data from the current table alteration descriptor, re-generate the target table's rows by copying existing row columns from the original table to a new table, and by creating new row columns based on the new-cols specs from the descriptor, and populating those new columns with data from the corresponding resource json object based on the new-column spec data for each new column.

S

This class manages the addition of search and sort capabilities to a table element.

U

updateOriginalDocument() - Method in class com.icf.iglistchanger.Controller
Replace the oldTable element in the original html document with the newTable element (that we've built in the processTableHeader() and processTableRows() methods).
updateOriginalDocument() - Method in class com.icf.iglistchanger.Controller
